resource.template: <#setting number_format="#">INSERT INTO sys_app(APP_ID_,CLIENT_CODE_,CLIENT_NAME_,CATEGORY_ID_,ICON_,STATUS_,DESCP_,HOME_TYPE_,URL_TYPE_,LAYOUT_,PARENT_MODULE_,ICON_PIC_,HOME_URL_,SN_,PARAMS_,AUTH_SETTING_,SHARE_,FREE_,IS_AUTH_,APP_TYPE_,BACK_COLOR_,VERSION_,COPYRIGHT_,PC_USE_,MOBILE_USE_,MOBILE_HOME_,PATH_,MENU_NAV_TYPE_,DELETED_,COMPANY_ID_,TENANT_ID_,CREATE_DEP_ID_,CREATE_BY_,CREATE_TIME_,UPDATE_BY_,UPDATE_TIME_) values( <#if APP_ID_??>'${APP_ID_}'<#else>null</#if>, <#if CLIENT_CODE_??>'${CLIENT_CODE_}'<#else>null</#if>, <#if CLIENT_NAME_??>'${CLIENT_NAME_}'<#else>null</#if>, <#if CATEGORY_ID_??>'${CATEGORY_ID_}'<#else>null</#if>, <#if ICON_??>'${ICON_}'<#else>null</#if>, <#if STATUS_??>'${STATUS_}'<#else>null</#if>, <#if DESCP_??>'${DESCP_}'<#else>null</#if>, <#if HOME_TYPE_??>'${HOME_TYPE_}'<#else>null</#if>, <#if URL_TYPE_??>'${URL_TYPE_}'<#else>null</#if>, <#if LAYOUT_??>'${LAYOUT_}'<#else>null</#if>, <#if PARENT_MODULE_??>'${PARENT_MODULE_}'<#else>null</#if>, <#if ICON_PIC_??>'${ICON_PIC_}'<#else>null</#if>, <#if HOME_URL_??>'${HOME_URL_}'<#else>null</#if>, <#if SN_??>${ SN_}<#else>null</#if>, <#if PARAMS_??>'${PARAMS_}'<#else>null</#if>, <#if AUTH_SETTING_??>'${ AUTH_SETTING_?replace("\n","\\n")?replace("\"","\\\"")?replace("'","''")}'<#else>null</#if>, <#if SHARE_??>'${SHARE_}'<#else>null</#if>, <#if FREE_??>'${FREE_}'<#else>null</#if>, <#if IS_AUTH_??>'${IS_AUTH_}'<#else>null</#if>, <#if APP_TYPE_??>'${ APP_TYPE_}'<#else>null</#if>, <#if BACK_COLOR_??>'${BACK_COLOR_}'<#else>null</#if>, <#if VERSION_??>'${VERSION_}'<#else>null</#if>, <#if COPYRIGHT_??>'${COPYRIGHT_}'<#else>null</#if>, <#if PC_USE_??>'${ PC_USE_}'<#else>null</#if>, <#if MOBILE_USE_??>'${ MOBILE_USE_}'<#else>null</#if>, <#if MOBILE_HOME_??>'${MOBILE_HOME_}'<#else>null</#if>, <#if PATH_??>'${PATH_}'<#else>null</#if>, <#if MENU_NAV_TYPE_??>'${ MENU_NAV_TYPE_}'<#else>null</#if>, <#if DELETED_??>${ DELETED_}<#else>null</#if>, <#if COMPANY_ID_?? > <#if COMPANY_ID_!='0'>'${ COMPANY_ID_}'<#else>'0'</#if><#else>'0'</#if>, <#if TENANT_ID_??>'${TENANT_ID_}'<#else>null</#if>, <#if CREATE_DEP_ID_??>'${CREATE_DEP_ID_}'<#else>null</#if>, <#if CREATE_BY_??>'${CREATE_BY_}'<#else>null</#if>, <#if CREATE_TIME_??>'${ CREATE_TIME_}'<#else>null</#if>, <#if UPDATE_BY_??>'${UPDATE_BY_}'<#else>null</#if>, <#if UPDATE_TIME_??>'${ UPDATE_TIME_}'<#else>null</#if>);

<#setting number_format="#">INSERT INTO sys_dic(DIC_ID_,TREE_ID_,NAME_,VALUE_,DESCP_,SN_,PATH_,PARENT_ID_,DELETED_,COMPANY_ID_,TENANT_ID_,CREATE_DEP_ID_,CREATE_BY_,CREATE_TIME_,UPDATE_BY_,UPDATE_TIME_,APP_ID_) values( <#if DIC_ID_??>'${DIC_ID_}'<#else>null</#if>, <#if TREE_ID_??>'${TREE_ID_}'<#else>null</#if>, <#if NAME_??>'${NAME_}'<#else>null</#if>, <#if VALUE_??>'${VALUE_}'<#else>null</#if>, <#if DESCP_??>'${DESCP_}'<#else>null</#if>, <#if SN_??>${ SN_}<#else>null</#if>, <#if PATH_??>'${PATH_}'<#else>null</#if>, <#if PARENT_ID_??>'${PARENT_ID_}'<#else>null</#if>, <#if DELETED_??>${ DELETED_}<#else>null</#if>, <#if COMPANY_ID_?? > <#if COMPANY_ID_!='0'>'${ COMPANY_ID_}'<#else>'0'</#if><#else>'0'</#if>, <#if TENANT_ID_??>'${TENANT_ID_}'<#else>null</#if>, <#if CREATE_DEP_ID_??>'${CREATE_DEP_ID_}'<#else>null</#if>, <#if CREATE_BY_??>'${CREATE_BY_}'<#else>null</#if>, <#if CREATE_TIME_??>'${ CREATE_TIME_}'<#else>null</#if>, <#if UPDATE_BY_??>'${UPDATE_BY_}'<#else>null</#if>, <#if UPDATE_TIME_??>'${ UPDATE_TIME_}'<#else>null</#if>, <#if APP_ID_??>'${APP_ID_}'<#else>null</#if>);

<#setting number_format="#">INSERT INTO sys_menu(MENU_ID_,APP_ID_,NAME_,ICON_PC_,ICON_PIC_,ICON_APP_,PARENT_ID_,PATH_,SN_,SHOW_TYPE_,MENU_KEY_,MENU_TYPE_,COMPONENT_,SETTING_TYPE_,BO_LIST_KEY_,URL_,METHOD_,PARAMS_,INST_CONFIG_,DELETED_,COMPANY_ID_,TENANT_ID_,CREATE_DEP_ID_,CREATE_BY_,CREATE_TIME_,UPDATE_BY_,UPDATE_TIME_) values( <#if MENU_ID_??>'${MENU_ID_}'<#else>null</#if>, <#if APP_ID_??>'${APP_ID_}'<#else>null</#if>, <#if NAME_??>'${NAME_}'<#else>null</#if>, <#if ICON_PC_??>'${ICON_PC_}'<#else>null</#if>, <#if ICON_PIC_??>'${ICON_PIC_}'<#else>null</#if>, <#if ICON_APP_??>'${ICON_APP_}'<#else>null</#if>, <#if PARENT_ID_??>'${PARENT_ID_}'<#else>null</#if>, <#if PATH_??>'${PATH_}'<#else>null</#if>, <#if SN_??>${ SN_}<#else>null</#if>, <#if SHOW_TYPE_??>'${SHOW_TYPE_}'<#else>null</#if>, <#if MENU_KEY_??>'${MENU_KEY_}'<#else>null</#if>, <#if MENU_TYPE_??>'${MENU_TYPE_}'<#else>null</#if>, <#if COMPONENT_??>'${COMPONENT_}'<#else>null</#if>, <#if SETTING_TYPE_??>'${SETTING_TYPE_}'<#else>null</#if>, <#if BO_LIST_KEY_??>'${BO_LIST_KEY_}'<#else>null</#if>, <#if URL_??>'${URL_}'<#else>null</#if>, <#if METHOD_??>'${METHOD_}'<#else>null</#if>, <#if PARAMS_??>'${PARAMS_}'<#else>null</#if>, <#if INST_CONFIG_??>'${ INST_CONFIG_?replace("\n","\\n")?replace("\"","\\\"")?replace("'","''")}'<#else>null</#if>, <#if DELETED_??>${ DELETED_}<#else>null</#if>, <#if COMPANY_ID_?? > <#if COMPANY_ID_!='0'>'${ COMPANY_ID_}'<#else>'0'</#if><#else>'0'</#if>, <#if TENANT_ID_??>'${TENANT_ID_}'<#else>null</#if>, <#if CREATE_DEP_ID_??>'${CREATE_DEP_ID_}'<#else>null</#if>, <#if CREATE_BY_??>'${CREATE_BY_}'<#else>null</#if>, <#if CREATE_TIME_??>'${ CREATE_TIME_}'<#else>null</#if>, <#if UPDATE_BY_??>'${UPDATE_BY_}'<#else>null</#if>, <#if UPDATE_TIME_??>'${ UPDATE_TIME_}'<#else>null</#if>);

<#setting number_format="#">INSERT INTO sys_route_type(ID_,ROUTE_TYPE_NAME_,DESCRIBE_,DELETED_,COMPANY_ID_,TENANT_ID_,CREATE_DEP_ID_,CREATE_BY_,CREATE_TIME_,UPDATE_BY_,UPDATE_TIME_) values( <#if ID_??>'${ID_}'<#else>null</#if>, <#if ROUTE_TYPE_NAME_??>'${ROUTE_TYPE_NAME_}'<#else>null</#if>, <#if DESCRIBE_??>'${DESCRIBE_}'<#else>null</#if>, <#if DELETED_??>${ DELETED_}<#else>null</#if>, <#if COMPANY_ID_?? > <#if COMPANY_ID_!='0'>'${ COMPANY_ID_}'<#else>'0'</#if><#else>'0'</#if>, <#if TENANT_ID_??>'${TENANT_ID_}'<#else>null</#if>, <#if CREATE_DEP_ID_??>'${CREATE_DEP_ID_}'<#else>null</#if>, <#if CREATE_BY_??>'${CREATE_BY_}'<#else>null</#if>, <#if CREATE_TIME_??>'${ CREATE_TIME_}'<#else>null</#if>, <#if UPDATE_BY_??>'${UPDATE_BY_}'<#else>null</#if>, <#if UPDATE_TIME_??>'${ UPDATE_TIME_}'<#else>null</#if>);

<#setting number_format="#">INSERT INTO sys_routing(ID_,ROUTING_NAME_,ROUTE_TYPE_,CONDITION_,CONDITION_PARAMETERS_,FILTER_,FILTER_PARAMETERS_,URI_,REMARK_,STATUS_,DELETED_,COMPANY_ID_,TENANT_ID_,CREATE_DEP_ID_,CREATE_BY_,CREATE_TIME_,UPDATE_BY_,UPDATE_TIME_,APP_ID_) values( <#if ID_??>'${ID_}'<#else>null</#if>, <#if ROUTING_NAME_??>'${ROUTING_NAME_}'<#else>null</#if>, <#if ROUTE_TYPE_??>'${ROUTE_TYPE_}'<#else>null</#if>, <#if CONDITION_??>'${CONDITION_}'<#else>null</#if>, <#if CONDITION_PARAMETERS_??>'${CONDITION_PARAMETERS_}'<#else>null</#if>, <#if FILTER_??>'${FILTER_}'<#else>null</#if>, <#if FILTER_PARAMETERS_??>'${FILTER_PARAMETERS_}'<#else>null</#if>, <#if URI_??>'${URI_}'<#else>null</#if>, <#if REMARK_??>'${REMARK_}'<#else>null</#if>, <#if STATUS_??>'${STATUS_}'<#else>null</#if>, <#if DELETED_??>${ DELETED_}<#else>null</#if>, <#if COMPANY_ID_?? > <#if COMPANY_ID_!='0'>'${ COMPANY_ID_}'<#else>'0'</#if><#else>'0'</#if>, <#if TENANT_ID_??>'${TENANT_ID_}'<#else>null</#if>, <#if CREATE_DEP_ID_??>'${CREATE_DEP_ID_}'<#else>null</#if>, <#if CREATE_BY_??>'${CREATE_BY_}'<#else>null</#if>, <#if CREATE_TIME_??>'${ CREATE_TIME_}'<#else>null</#if>, <#if UPDATE_BY_??>'${UPDATE_BY_}'<#else>null</#if>, <#if UPDATE_TIME_??>'${ UPDATE_TIME_}'<#else>null</#if>, <#if APP_ID_??>'${APP_ID_}'<#else>null</#if>);

<#setting number_format="#">INSERT INTO sys_tree(TREE_ID_,CODE_,NAME_,PATH_,PARENT_ID_,ALIAS_,DESCP_,CAT_KEY_,SN_,DATA_SHOW_TYPE_,DELETED_,COMPANY_ID_,TENANT_ID_,CREATE_DEP_ID_,CREATE_BY_,CREATE_TIME_,UPDATE_BY_,UPDATE_TIME_,APP_ID_) values( <#if TREE_ID_??>'${TREE_ID_}'<#else>null</#if>, <#if CODE_??>'${CODE_}'<#else>null</#if>, <#if NAME_??>'${NAME_}'<#else>null</#if>, <#if PATH_??>'${PATH_}'<#else>null</#if>, <#if PARENT_ID_??>'${PARENT_ID_}'<#else>null</#if>, <#if ALIAS_??>'${ALIAS_}'<#else>null</#if>, <#if DESCP_??>'${DESCP_}'<#else>null</#if>, <#if CAT_KEY_??>'${CAT_KEY_}'<#else>null</#if>, <#if SN_??>${ SN_}<#else>null</#if>, <#if DATA_SHOW_TYPE_??>'${DATA_SHOW_TYPE_}'<#else>null</#if>, <#if DELETED_??>${ DELETED_}<#else>null</#if>, <#if COMPANY_ID_?? > <#if COMPANY_ID_!='0'>'${ COMPANY_ID_}'<#else>'0'</#if><#else>'0'</#if>, <#if TENANT_ID_??>'${TENANT_ID_}'<#else>null</#if>, <#if CREATE_DEP_ID_??>'${CREATE_DEP_ID_}'<#else>null</#if>, <#if CREATE_BY_??>'${CREATE_BY_}'<#else>null</#if>, <#if CREATE_TIME_??>'${ CREATE_TIME_}'<#else>null</#if>, <#if UPDATE_BY_??>'${UPDATE_BY_}'<#else>null</#if>, <#if UPDATE_TIME_??>'${ UPDATE_TIME_}'<#else>null</#if>, <#if APP_ID_??>'${APP_ID_}'<#else>null</#if>);

<#setting number_format="#">INSERT INTO sys_tree_cat(CAT_ID_,KEY_,NAME_,SN_,DESCP_,DELETED_,COMPANY_ID_,TENANT_ID_,CREATE_DEP_ID_,CREATE_BY_,CREATE_TIME_,UPDATE_BY_,UPDATE_TIME_) values( <#if CAT_ID_??>'${CAT_ID_}'<#else>null</#if>, <#if KEY_??>'${KEY_}'<#else>null</#if>, <#if NAME_??>'${NAME_}'<#else>null</#if>, <#if SN_??>${ SN_}<#else>null</#if>, <#if DESCP_??>'${DESCP_}'<#else>null</#if>, <#if DELETED_??>${ DELETED_}<#else>null</#if>, <#if COMPANY_ID_?? > <#if COMPANY_ID_!='0'>'${ COMPANY_ID_}'<#else>'0'</#if><#else>'0'</#if>, <#if TENANT_ID_??>'${TENANT_ID_}'<#else>null</#if>, <#if CREATE_DEP_ID_??>'${CREATE_DEP_ID_}'<#else>null</#if>, <#if CREATE_BY_??>'${CREATE_BY_}'<#else>null</#if>, <#if CREATE_TIME_??>'${ CREATE_TIME_}'<#else>null</#if>, <#if UPDATE_BY_??>'${UPDATE_BY_}'<#else>null</#if>, <#if UPDATE_TIME_??>'${ UPDATE_TIME_}'<#else>null</#if>);

<#setting number_format="#">INSERT INTO sys_external_api(ID_,SERVICE_,API_NAME_,PATH_,METHOD_,PARAMS_,HEADERS_,BODY_,TYPE_,CREATE_DEP_ID_,DELETED_,COMPANY_ID_,TENANT_ID_,CREATE_BY_,CREATE_TIME_,UPDATE_BY_,UPDATE_TIME_) values( <#if ID_??>'${ID_}'<#else>null</#if>, <#if SERVICE_??>'${SERVICE_}'<#else>null</#if>, <#if API_NAME_??>'${API_NAME_}'<#else>null</#if>, <#if PATH_??>'${PATH_}'<#else>null</#if>, <#if METHOD_??>'${METHOD_}'<#else>null</#if>, <#if PARAMS_??>'${ PARAMS_?replace("\n","\\n")?replace("\"","\\\"")?replace("'","''")}'<#else>null</#if>, <#if HEADERS_??>'${HEADERS_}'<#else>null</#if>, <#if BODY_??>'${ BODY_?replace("\n","\\n")?replace("\"","\\\"")?replace("'","''")}'<#else>null</#if>, <#if TYPE_??>'${TYPE_}'<#else>null</#if>, <#if CREATE_DEP_ID_??>'${CREATE_DEP_ID_}'<#else>null</#if>, <#if DELETED_??>${ DELETED_}<#else>null</#if>, <#if COMPANY_ID_?? > <#if COMPANY_ID_!='0'>'${ COMPANY_ID_}'<#else>'0'</#if><#else>'0'</#if>, <#if TENANT_ID_??>'${TENANT_ID_}'<#else>null</#if>, <#if CREATE_BY_??>'${CREATE_BY_}'<#else>null</#if>, <#if CREATE_TIME_??>'${ CREATE_TIME_}'<#else>null</#if>, <#if UPDATE_BY_??>'${UPDATE_BY_}'<#else>null</#if>, <#if UPDATE_TIME_??>'${ UPDATE_TIME_}'<#else>null</#if>);
